name: Redentu
tagline: Full Cycle Product Development and Consulting
description:
Redentu develops websites and web applications with various technical complexity, starting from simple websites to high-loaded e-commerce solutions. Our customers are able to choose full-cycle development package or any other service separately, including web development, visual design, quality assurance, code review and refactoring, usability testing and technical consulting.
Choosing our services, you get a collaboration with highly-qualified professionals, who are really passionate about their work. Our team members love challenges and complex large-scale projects. We always think out of the box and look for creative solutions. We appreciate every project and build our relations with customers on mutual advantage, trust and understanding their needs.
